name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a Senior Software Engineer (Search) with 8+ years in software engineering, I excel in designing and implementing robust search infrastructures, focusing on CI/CD practices and Object-Oriented Programming. Proficient in **Ruby** and **Ruby on Rails**, I leverage **Elasticsearch** and **OpenSearch** for indexing and query optimization, ensuring high performance and reliability in search functionality. My technical acumen extends to utilizing vector databases and AI/LLM tools, creating solutions that address complex search scenarios. In addition to my technical skills, I possess strong communication capabilities in both Polish and English, enabling effective collaboration across diverse teams. My solid background in software development empowers me to deliver innovative solutions tailored to meet business objectives.
